alert.note: Alert for Big Horn; Powder River; Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 6:35PM MDT until July 03 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BIG HORN...SOUTHWESTERN POWDER RIVER...SOUTHERN ROSEBUD AND NORTHEASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 635 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 31 miles northeast of Sheridan, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Birney, Birney Village and Otter. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
